scripts.build:docs:with-cid: DOCS_BUILD_CID=${DOCS_BUILD_CID:-$(cat dist/docs-cid.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'bafy...placeholder')} docusaurus build docs --out-dir ../dist/docs
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:docs && npm run postbuild:cid && npm run build:docs:with-cid && npm run build:portal && npm run build:finalize
scripts.build:portal: cp demo-results/world.json portal/public/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: world.json not found, continuing...' && VITE_DOCS_CID="$(cat dist/docs-cid.txt 2>/dev/null || echo 'bafy...placeholder')" VITE_BUILD_COMMIT="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo unknown)" npm run --prefix portal build
scripts.build:finalize: mkdir -p dist/portal && cp -R portal/dist/* dist/portal/ && mkdir -p dist/demo-results && cp -R demo-results/* dist/demo-results/ && node scripts/write-redirects.js
scripts.test:deployment: npm run build:static && npm run build:docs && npm run postbuild:cid && npm run build:docs:with-cid && cd portal && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/portal && cp -R portal/dist/* dist/portal/ && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test: npm run test:portal && npm run test:build && npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:minimal: npm run build:static && npm run build:docs && mkdir -p dist/portal && echo 'Minimal build completed'
